attributes.action: Scrap the 2019-2020 FA Premier League and record no Winner.
attributes.additional_details: For the health of the Nation.
attributes.background: To safeguard the health of the Nation, the UK Government should ensure that their citizens are not to see any more Premier League games and declare the 2019-2020 Championship null and void - no Winners

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300885
